card_text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having exactly 5 EARTH monsters in your GY. When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster in either player's GY; Special Summon that target. You can only use this effect of "Grandsoil the Elemental Lord" once per turn. If this face-up card leaves the field, skip the Battle Phase of your next turn.
